name: outreach
description: A Social media app for developers

scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-client && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.azure: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client && npm run start

author: Ashish Patel
